pullrequest.title: [Gazebo9] Enabling dynamic linking for Windows build

content.raw: It turned out the visible attributes for the template class EnumIface between gcc and msvc are different and I decided to conditionally define GZ\_ENUM to handle this case. I reworked the change and compiled successfully both on my Ubuntu Desktop and Windows machine. Please take a look thanks!
content.html: It turned out the visible attributes for the template class EnumIface between gcc and msvc are different and I decided to conditionally define GZ_ENUM to handle this case. I reworked the change and compiled successfully both on my Ubuntu Desktop and Windows machine. Please take a look thanks!
